summary: Feature request to expose histogram bucket overrides for custom metric bucket sizes in the TypeScript SDK, as implemented in sdk-core.
userImpact: Users cannot customize histogram bucket sizes for metrics collection, limiting their ability to tailor metrics to their specific monitoring needs.
proposedFix: Expose histogram bucket overrides made available in sdk-core PR #844
keyQuote: Need to expose histogram bucket overrides made available in https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-core/pull/844
